snippet.title: Pathogen X | Official pre-release trailer
snippet.description:
Hello everyone! I am an indie developer - Evgenii
And this is my second game:

An atmospheric first-person survival horror game in which you take on the role of Special Agent Aiden Clark and embark on a deadly mission into an underground laboratory to destroy a biological threat and extract a pathogen sample.

I will be very grateful to everyone for their support and adding the game to the vishlist :)

steam - store.steampowered.com/app/2508980

The trailer presents:
1. Some locations from the game (military base, bunker, sewer and quarantine complex)
the rest are at the polishing stage.

2. In this trailer, only one of the subspecies of infected is presented, but in the game you will have to fight with different types of monsters, which are special infected with different abilities, as well as several bosses.

3. Use the environment and combine different types of weapons, each of which will be effective in certain situations.
